alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 24 at 3:18PM CDT until June 24 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Benson County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Eddy County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 318 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Sheyenne, or 25 miles southwest of Devils Lake, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Sheyenne and Oberon. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
